tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_distribution_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_consumed FLOAT,
    location_id INT,
    energy_source TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE historical_energy_data (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL(10,2),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_patterns (
    pattern_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL(10,2),
    peak_demand DECIMAL(10,2),
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_sources (
    source_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    source_type VARCHAR(50),
    capacity DECIMAL(10,2),
    efficiency DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_distribution (
    distribution_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_id UUID,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    energy_consumed DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_waste (
    waste_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    waste_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE historical_energy_data (
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  energy_consumption DECIMAL,
  energy_production DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_distribution (
  distribution_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  city_id UUID,
  distribution_zone TEXT,
  energy_delivered DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_reduction (
  reduction_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location TEXT,
  waste_type TEXT,
  waste_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_costs (
  cost_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  cost_type TEXT,
  cost_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE efficiency_metrics (
  metric_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  efficiency_type TEXT,
  efficiency_score DECIMAL
)
